snippet: On Saturday, Floyd Mayweather Jr. remained unbeaten by holding off Miguel Cotto in a unanimous decision victory at the MGM’s Grand Garden Arena in Las Vegas.
abstract: Floyd Mayweather Jr defeats Miguel Cotto by unanimous decision to claim WBA super welterweight title; Mayweather remains undefeated.
lead_paragraph: On Saturday, Floyd Mayweather Jr. remained unbeaten by holding off Miguel Cotto in a unanimous decision victory at the MGM’s Grand Garden Arena in Las Vegas.

headline.seo: Mayweather Beats Cotto to Stay Unbeaten
headline.main: Mayweather’s Win Is Unanimous but Not Easy
headline.print_headline: Mayweather’s Win Is Unanimous but Not Easy
